conversation.content: Wait. I just saw. Forty-nine ninety-nine? Monthly? Since when—no wait, let me check—

*exhales* Okay, I can definitely help you with that cancellation. Let me just pull up your account... hmm, I'm seeing subscription ID SUB-47291-MB here. Started back in March. For the premium streaming package?
March? That's—geez. Eight months. Of nothing. I don't even—
*sharp inhale* Yeah, I... I get it. Happens more than you'd think actually. So the system shows, uh, zero usage since May. Which is. Not great. Let me see what options I have for you here.
Zero usage. Course. So can you just. Kill it? Now?

Absolutely, yes, canceling that right now... *exhales* Done. Effective immediately. Reference number is CAN-8827-XK. The thing is though. Our refund policy only covers thirty days. I wish I had better news on that front.
Thirty days. Out of eight months. That's. Hmm. Okay so what if—
*soft exhale* Look, I'm... between you and me? I hate this policy. Account's showing $399.92 in charges total. Best I can officially do is that last month. But let me. Actually. Hold on.
Four hundred—okay wait. You're checking something? Or...

So there's this. Uh. Retention credit code, RET-LOYAL-50. Technically for keeping customers but. Since you had zero usage. I could maybe argue this counts as, er, service recovery? Gets you another fifty back.
Service recovery. Ha. Sure. I mean. Better than nothing right?
*exhales* Right, exactly. So with both credits you'd get $99.98 back. Processing in three to five business days to your card ending in 4429. Not the full amount but. It's something at least.
Ninety-nine ninety-eight. Out of four hundred. Well. Next time I'll. Actually check my statements.
Honestly? Set yourself a reminder. I, um. I learned that the hard way myself actually. Had a gym membership for. *nervous exhale* Fourteen months. Never went once.
Fourteen months! Okay that's. That makes me feel. Slightly less stupid actually.

*soft laugh* Right? The worst part was driving past it every day. Anyway your confirmation email's going to CU47291@gmail. And genuinely, if there's any issue with that refund. Call back, reference CAN-8827-XK.
Every day. Ouch. Yeah no that's. Thanks though. For the extra fifty.
Of course, I just. Wish it could be more, you know? System's already processed the cancellation so. You're all set there. No more charges going forward.
Good. Done. One less thing to. Hmm. Actually quick question—
*inhale* Yeah, shoot. Still got your account up here. What's, uh. What's on your mind?
